title: News live: PM insists Australia will do ‘nothing to assist or repatriate’ women and children stranded in Syria
Machine Learning Uses Physics Rules As Extra Data To Improve Accuracy
desc: Researchers have demonstrated that physics-informed neural networks learn by effectively fitting to an infinite amount of hidden data derived from the governing physical equations, revealing a singular learning process crucial for understanding prediction accuracy and generalisation ability.
